Dialogue.Page: Recruit! I heard you just completed your training, and I'm glad to see you have your own ship now!

DialogueOption.Text: What is there to explore around here?
How dangerous is that water column?

Dialogue.Page: Right now I'm on break, and we're still moving our base of operations here.
We'd like to build a new building for it, but there's nowhere dry or level enough for it left on this island!
So at the moment we're just occupying one of these residences (we got permission of course.)
Maybe you could help find a good location?
There are a few Precursor ruins on the seafloor that you can check out.
I'd be careful though, one of them is leaking some sort of strange energy, fried the probe I sent in!
And obviously, try not to drown.
I always thought the Precursors were only on Warm Embrace, but we've found their presence on every planet!
Not as dangerous as you'd expect!
It can hurt a little if you get caught in it, but sometimes it won't even slow you down.
What you should really worry about is the black hole in orbit. We sent a probe in, and never heard back from it! I'd steer clear of it.
